headline: Sandbox Banking (YC W17) Is Hiring – Full-Time – Remote Positions
description:
Sandbox provides Banking as a Service (BaaS) infrastructure for fintechs and banks. We help institutions quickly and securely integrate new software. We are growing quickly, YC backed, and possess an enviable runway. Our team is looking to hire exceptional individuals for the following: Solution Delivery Engineering Manager (https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/06/11/solution-delivery-engineering-manager/) Will lead a team of seasoned and talented engineers that is focused on developing integrations between banking systems for client institutions

Solution Delivery Engineer (https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/04/30/solution-delivery-software-engineer/) Will scope requirements, develop, test and deploy specific customer integrations using our Glyue platform

Project Manager (https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/07/30/project-manager-remote/) will handle a variety of tasks required to deliver a successful implementation of Sandbox that powers the integration between a fintech’s software and a FI’s systems.

Senior Platform Software Engineer (https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/04/30/senior-platform-software-engineer/ ) Successful candidates will fulfill the requirements of our Platform Software Engineer role and also possess technical leadership, software architecture design, and devops abilities. A minimum of 4 years of professional experience is required.
headline_zh-Hans: 沙盒银行（YC W17）正在招聘 - 全职 - 远程职位
headline_zh-Hant: 沙盒銀行（YC W17）正在招聘 - 全職 - 遠程職位
description_zh-Hans:
沙盒为金融科技公司和银行提供银行服务（BaaS）基础设施。我们帮助机构快速、安全地整合新软件。我们正在快速成长，有YC支持，并拥有令人羡慕的跑道。我们的团队正在为以下工作招聘优秀人才。 解决方案交付工程经理 (https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/06/11/solution-delivery-engineering-manager/) 将领导一个由经验丰富的优秀工程师组成的团队，专注于为客户机构开发银行系统之间的集成

解决方案交付工程师(https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/04/30/solution-delivery-software-engineer/) 将使用我们的Glyue平台确定需求范围、开发、测试和部署具体的客户集成

项目经理 (https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/07/30/project-manager-remote/)将处理各种必要的任务，以成功交付沙盒，为金融科技公司的软件和金融机构的系统之间的整合提供动力。

高级平台软件工程师(https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/04/30/senior-platform-software-engineer/ ) 成功的候选人将满足我们的平台软件工程师角色的要求，同时拥有技术领导力、软件架构设计和devops能力。要求有至少4年的专业经验。
description_zh-Hant:
沙盒為金融科技公司和銀行提供銀行服務（BaaS）基礎設施。我們幫助機構快速、安全地整合新軟件。我們正在快速成長，有YC支持，並擁有令人羨慕的跑道。我們的團隊正在為以下工作招聘優秀人才。 解決方案交付工程經理 (https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/06/11/solution-delivery-engineering-manager/) 將領導一個由經驗豐富的優秀工程師組成的團隊，專注於為客戶機構開發銀行系統之間的集成

解決方案交付工程師(https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/04/30/solution-delivery-software-engineer/) 將使用我們的Glyue平臺確定需求範圍、開發、測試和部署具體的客戶集成

項目經理 (https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/07/30/project-manager-remote/)將處理各種必要的任務，以成功交付沙盒，為金融科技公司的軟件和金融機構的系統之間的整合提供動力。

高級平臺軟件工程師(https://sandboxbanking.com/2021/04/30/senior-platform-software-engineer/ ) 成功的候選人將滿足我們的平臺軟件工程師角色的要求，同時擁有技術領導力、軟件架構設計和devops能力。要求有至少4年的專業經驗。
